item.title: Free PPTP VPN servers
item.description: I’d recommend you all using some VPN to keep your identity safe and private. Here’s some setup: $ pptpsetup --create vpnde --server pptp.freedevpn.com --username free --password --encrypt $ pptpsetup --create vpnca --server freecavpn.com --username free --password --encrypt $ pptpsetup --create vpnl --server freenlvpn.com --username free --password --encrypt $ pptpsetup --create vpnuk --server freeukvpn.com --username free --password --encrypt For the passwords have a look at freenlvpn.com, freedevpn.com, freeukvpn.com, freecavpn.com. The VPN passwords changes every 12 hours, so keep in mind to change whenever the authentication failes.
